text: Iva Bukač (born 27 November 1994) is a Croatian footballer who plays as a midfielder and has appeared for the Croatia women's national team. ==Career== Bukač has been capped for the Croatia national team, appearing for the team during the UEFA Women's Euro 2021 qualifying cycle. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Croatian women's footballers Category:Croatia women's international footballers Category:Women's association football midfielders
title: Iva Bukač
